templates.name: Employee Onboarding
templates.description: Standard employee onboarding form used across all clients

templates.name: Attendance
templates.description: Standard monthly attendance tracking template used across all clients

templates.name: Leave Management
templates.description: Standard leave request and tracking template used across all clients

templates.name: Leave
templates.description: All leave requests for the cycle must be processed.

templates.name: Loan
templates.description: EMI and outstanding balances must be updated.

templates.name: Reimbursement
templates.description: Claims should be approved before payroll.

ruleTypes.label: Numeric Range
ruleTypes.description: Validate numeric values within a range

ruleTypes.label: Unique Value
ruleTypes.description: Ensure value is unique across records

ruleTypes.label: Date Format
ruleTypes.description: Validate if the field contains a valid date

ruleTypes.label: Date Before
ruleTypes.description: Validates if this date is before another date

ruleTypes.label: Date After
ruleTypes.description: Validates if this date is after another date

ruleTypes.label: Date Range
ruleTypes.description: Validate date is between MinDate - MaxDate

ruleTypes.label: Leave Balance Check
ruleTypes.description: Validate leave request against available balance

ruleTypes.label: Duplicate Prevention
ruleTypes.description: Prevent duplicate entries based on key fields

ruleTypes.label: Format Validation
ruleTypes.description: Validate data format for specific field types

ruleTypes.label: Conditional Required
ruleTypes.description: Field required based on other field values

severityLevels.label: Error
severityLevels.description: Critical validation error that prevents submission

severityLevels.label: Warning
severityLevels.description: Non-critical issue that should be reviewed

auditLogs.details: Approved employee onboarding task for John Doe (EMP001)
Updated personal information for Sarah Johnson (EMP002)
Bulk uploaded attendance records for January 2023 (150 records)
Created new payroll calculation template v2.1
Automatically assigned 5 pending tasks to available operators
Validation failed for leave application - invalid date range
Rejected loan application for Mike Davis - insufficient credit score
Failed login attempt from unknown IP address
Updated department assignment for David Wilson (EMP005)
Bulk uploaded salary adjustments for 25 employees

unclaimedTasks.title: Review Employee Onboarding - John Smith
unclaimedTasks.description: Complete verification of personal details, employment documents, and system access setup for new hire John Smith from Engineering department.

unclaimedTasks.title: Process Leave Application - Sarah Johnson
unclaimedTasks.description: Review and approve/reject annual leave request for 5 days from Jan 20-24, 2024. Check leave balance and company policy compliance.

unclaimedTasks.title: Verify Attendance Records - January Batch
unclaimedTasks.description: Cross-check attendance data for 50 employees against biometric logs and manual entries. Flag any discrepancies for resolution.

unclaimedTasks.title: Loan Application Review - Mike Davis
unclaimedTasks.description: Evaluate personal loan application for $15,000 with 12-month tenure. Verify eligibility, credit check, and documentation completeness.

unclaimedTasks.title: Reimbursement Processing - Travel Expenses
unclaimedTasks.description: Process business travel reimbursement claims totaling $2,450 for client meetings. Verify receipts, calculate eligible amounts, and prepare payment.

unclaimedTasks.title: Bulk Data Import - New Employee Batch
unclaimedTasks.description: Import and validate data for 25 new employees from Excel template. Handle data mapping, validation errors, and system integration.

unclaimedTasks.title: Performance Review Setup - Q4 2023
unclaimedTasks.description: Configure performance review cycle for 120 employees. Set up review templates, assign reviewers, and establish timelines.

unclaimedTasks.title: Payroll Adjustment - Overtime Calculation
unclaimedTasks.description: Recalculate overtime pay for engineering team based on updated project hours. Verify timesheets and apply correct overtime rates.
